#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
main()
{
	std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	ll n,m,i,count,max;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;max=0;
		cin>>n;
		ll a[n];
		cin>>a[0];
		for(i=1;i<n;)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			if(a[i-1]==a[i])
			{
				count++;
				i++;
			}
			else
			{
				i++;
				count=0;
			}
			if(max<count)
			{
				max=count;
			}
		}
		if(max==0)
		cout<<"0"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<max<<endl;
		
	}
}
